subject: Speed Skating
Short Track Skating
Ice Skating
lead_paragraph: Apolo Anton Ohno earned a narrow victory in the 500 meters and made a daring pass to win the 1,000 at the United States short track national championships.
snippet: Apolo Anton Ohno earned a narrow victory in the 500 meters and made a daring pass to win the 1,000 at the United States short track national championships.
